description: a hellspawn of brimstone

name: hemor
description: Much like a long necked dog, this antennad creature moves in short, erratic bursts, and it's many chitin plates stick up like a startled cat's fur at any provocation.

special_attacks.monster_message: The hemor goes to it's haunches like an angry dog and it's antenna reel forward and whip at your mind itself, each crack a tear in your will to live.

name: hemorrhage
description: Much like a long necked dog, this antennad creature moves in short, erratic bursts, and it's many chitin plates stick up like a startled cat's fur at any provocation.

special_attacks.monster_message: The hemor goes to it's haunches like an angry dog and it's antenna reel forward and whip at your mind itself, each crack a tear in your will to live.

name: frigiling
description: A low, stalking form like a rat save the two disproportionally large spires of ice that carry it through the sky.

special_attacks.monster_message: The frigiling suddenly barks a wave of pure cold.

name: frigiliege
description: A low, stalking form like a rat save the two disproportionally large spires of ice that carry it through the sky. This one tends to stand on it's hind legs, it's eyes showing a keen intelligence.

special_attacks.monster_message: The frigiliege suddenly barks a wave of pure cold.

name: frigilord
description: A low, stalking form like a rat save the two disproportionally large spires of dark ice that carry it through the sky. This one tends to stand on it's hind legs, it's tactical eyes scanning for weakness.

special_attacks.monster_message: The frigilord suddenly barks a wave of pure cold.

name: sparklet
description: A treachorous, impish little 'creature' with a body made only of electric sparks.

death_function.message: The amalgamation of sparks dissolves into nothing.

special_attacks.monster_message: The sparklet flexes and sparks fly.

name: sparklem
description: A treachorous, impish little 'creature' with a body made only of electric sparks. It seems to be splitting and reforming continuously, it's failed attempts at reproduction causing sparks to fly.

death_function.message: The amalgamation of sparks dissolves into nothing.

special_attacks.monster_message: The sparklem flexes and sparks fly.

name: sparklus
description: A treachorous, impish little 'creature' with a body made only of electric sparks. This one keeps splitting off into forks, sparking infinitely and creating a lazer-like visual effect.

death_function.message: The amalgamation of sparks dissolves into nothing.

special_attacks.monster_message: The sparklus flexes and sparks fly.
The sparklus sparks off into branches.

name: Summon Sparklet
description: Survival not guaranteed.

name: corrolug
description: A slow, fat glob of pulsating acid. Occassionally something resembling a face will stir it's way to the top of the soup just to gurgle up more acid.

death_function.message: The corrosive mess has been distributed evenly enough to be called dead.

special_attacks.description: The corrolug pelts you with acid from afar.

name: corrolump
description: A slow, fat glob of pulsating acid. Occassionally something resembling a face will stir it's way to the top of the soup just to gurgle up more acid. It seems weighed down by the writhing masses trapped inside.

death_function.message: The corrosive mess has been distributed evenly enough to be called dead.

special_attacks.description: The corrolump pelts you with acid from afar.

name: corrogglomaration
description: A slow, fat glob of pulsating acid. Occassionally something resembling a face will stir it's way to the top of the soup just to gurgle up more acid. It's gutterous bowels swarm with black and green ooze.

special_attacks.description: The corrogglomaration pelts you with acid from afar.

name: blastlid
description: Something like the goblins you've seen except this one seems to be shaking brimstone off of itself with each step. A wild look in their eye tells you they're nothing to trifle with.

special_attacks.monster_message: The blastlid throws a dash of brimstone powder and uses it's hot breath to ignite it mid-air.

name: blastop
description: Something like a goblin except this one seems to be shaking brimstone off of itself with each step. A wild look in their eye seems to show disregard for life.

special_attacks.monster_message: The blastop throws a dash of brimstone powder and uses it's hot breath to ignite it mid-air.

name: Hellfire
description: Tear at your life force, spilling your inner fire from your heart and all around you.

name: blastoff
description: Something like a goblin except this one seems to be shaking brimstone off of itself with each step. This one is large and mature enough to fly by igniting it's brimstone dandruff. Seems to have a regard at least a tiny regard for it's safety as it hides in it's own igneous cloud.

special_attacks.monster_message: The blastoff throws a dash of brimstone powder and uses it's hot breath to ignite it mid-air.

name: devil's blacksmith
description: A burning man with a dull look in his eye and a growth on his arm in the shape of an even duller hammer. Brimstone ash drifts off of his disintegrating clothing and flesh, slowly turning him into something entirely more demonic.

name: devil's lumberjack
description: A burning man with a sharp look in his eye and a growth on his arm in the shape of an even sharper axe. Brimstone ash drifts off of his disintegrating clothing and flesh, slowly turning him into something entirely more demonic.

name: devil's assassin
description: A burning man with a cruel look in his eye and a growth on his arm in the shape of an even crueler knife. Brimstone ash drifts off of his disintegrating clothing and flesh, slowly turning him into something entirely more demonic.

name: devil's gunslinger
description: A burning man with a dangerous look in his eye and a growth on his arm in the shape of an even more dangerous revolver. Brimstone ash drifts off of his disintegrating clothing and flesh, slowly turning him into something entirely more demonic.

name: goblimp
description: A fat little creature with skin of rough black leather, a long snout like an ant-eater's and two tiny black arms sticking out of it's back, a garbage bag slung over it's spine. It glides from perch to perch by stretching it's own skin thin like a cloak and blowing itself up with sticky, sulfuric air, which it slowly releases to gain buoyancy. It's eyes shine with mischief and greed, and it's behavior reflects that.

special_attacks.description: The moment it think that it's safe, the goblimp swallows sulfur and fires it's corrosive residue from it's nose.

name: greedy goblimp
description: A fat little creature with skin of rough black leather, a long snout like an ant-eater's and two tiny black arms sticking out of it's back, a garbage bag slung over it's spine. It hops around on crooked legs, gliding from perch to perch by stretching it's own skin thin like a cloak and blowing itself up with sticky, sulfuric air, which it slowly releases to gain buoyancy. It's eyes shine with mischief and greed, and it's behavior reflects that enormously.

special_attacks.description: The moment it think that it's safe, the goblimp swallows sulfur and fires it's corrosive residue from it's nose.

name: Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder
description: A grey skinned ogre with ringed horns and a mouth filled with flame wields a tall axe that he holds with such obvious expertise and confidence that you almost mistake him for a brute. Were it not for the cold intelligence in his eye...

death_function.message: Yidris solemnly leaves through a portal, unscathed.

special_attacks.monster_message: Yidris blinks his gargantuan eye and nether magic incarnates before them...

name: Nether Mages
description: Survival not guaranteed.
If you could call it corporeal, this 'thing' would be a mass of rainbow light. That is, if you can get close enough to see it.

death_function.message: Where once there was, there simply isn't.

special_attacks.monster_message: Red energy itself is released from the creation entity.
White energy itself is released from the creation entity.
Blue energy itself is released from the creation entity.
Green energy itself is released from the creation entity.

description: A tall bronze statue with a head both made of and wreathed in flame. It's hands grip an ethereal horn, silently calling for creatures of the night.

death_function.message: The skies seems to brighten and the distant horns fade as Ortiel collapses in on itself, returning to whence it came.

special_attacks.monster_message: Ortiel blows their horn, and evil responds in kind.

description: A tall bronze statue with a head both made of and wreathed in flame. It's hands grip an ethereal horn, silently calling for creatures of the night.

death_function.message: The skies seems to brighten and the distant horns fade as Ortiel collapses in on itself, returning to whence it came.

special_attacks.monster_message: Ortiel blows their horn, and evil responds in kind.

description: Spawns the true form of the devil.
Precisely as you imagined.

death_function.message: The devil cringes and barks curses! His ragged human body and haughty attitude tear into shreds as his true form is revealed!

special_attacks.monster_message: The devil bares it's teeth and smiles magic into existence.
The devil lazily steps yawns through a portal.

description: The true form of the Devil himself!

death_function.message: Somehow you manage to take off a chunk off this thing. As it retreats to another plane, you see an ever-recognizable fear cross it's face: For the first time, the Devil is the prey.

special_attacks.monster_message: With a wicked gleam in it's eye, the devil opens a new gateway to this reality.
The devil's wounds sear themselves shut.
The devil hastily beckons for reinforcements.
The devil screeches and falls through a dark portal, reappearing elsewhere.

name: Glimpse of Brimstone
description: An extremely odd fractal division in the air that seems to split itself into pieces. This 'thing' moves on as it's pieces combust, foul creatures falling from their corpses.
A presence stands there, somewhere near you. If only you could reach out and touch it, it feels so warm...

death_function.message: Like the end of a tale told well, it came too early and went too soon.

special_attacks.monster_message: Atraxa's radiant light purifies her own darkness...
Atraxa's holy light turns foe into friend...

name: Atraxa's Polymorph
description: The warmth of the Praetors overwhelms you.

Much like a dog with a fish' skin and face, this tall, statuesque creature keeps it's bulging belly close to the ground as it violently shrieks and flops around on it's hind legs looking for sustenance. It's sack occasionally pulses or twists, almost as if something is trying to get out.

special_attacks.monster_message: The nephilims stomach sack engorges and it rears open it's mouth for more to be added to the brood, already lashing out for something to eat. They slither and claw out of it's throat fully grown and hunting for more.

description: Much like a dog with a fish' skin and face, this tall, statuesque creature has adapted to lift it's head high into the air, licking the air and scanning for prey as it's stomach sack pulses.

special_attacks.monster_message: The nephilims stomach sack engorges and it rears open it's mouth for more to be added to the brood, already lashing out for something to eat. They slither and claw out of it's throat fully grown and hunting for more, fading into dust when the hunger goes unsated.

description: Several creatures with snake-like heads connected at the ground from which they grow. Each births a new nephilim as rapidly as they can.

special_attacks.monster_message: The nephilims stomach sack engorges and it rears open it's mouth for more to be added to the brood, already lashing out for something to eat. They slither and claw out of it's throat fully grown and hunting for more, fading into dust when the hunger goes unsated.

name: Dune Brood Nephilim
description: Like moths to a flame, the dune brood is drawn forward from the Earth to wreak havoc and grow.

name: Dune Brood Nephilim
description: Like moths to a flame, the dune brood is drawn forward from the Earth to wreak havoc and grow.
